message: Hello Bob, I'm offering this product to you at a price of $14,000. I believe it offers significant value at this price point. What do you think?
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $12,500. I believe that's a fair price considering the product's value to me.
Bob, I appreciate your interest.  While $12,500 is a fair offer, the value of this product to me is quite high.  How about we meet in the middle at $13,250?
I'm willing to meet you in the middle, but I was thinking more along the lines of $13,000. I'm trying to save some money here, but I'm still very interested in the product.
